extracted_metadata.title: Salman Abu Sitta "The Right of Return: The Only Key To Peace" (Full lecture)
extracted_metadata.description: Salman Abu Sitta: "The Right of Return: The Only Key To Peace" - The Edward Said Memorial Lecture. (Full length), at the University of South Australia City West Campus -Adelaide, Australia. You can jump to any segment: 00:00 Introduction of Samer Shahin 08:03 Introduction of Bassem Dally 17:50 Dr. Salman Abu Sitta Lecture 18:40 1) Edward Said / Australia 33:30 2) Al-Nakba 42:33 3) The Way Forward 51:15 4) Reconstruction of Destroyed Villages 01:01:30 5) ANZACS 01:09:02 6) I Have Faith 01:12:25 Q & A
